Articles.Content:
I have an problem with small probes and probe landers.

They rotate so fast they are hard to control. The opposite problem from usual:)

with SAS they stop fast but rotate as fast as before, rcs will increase the weight to much. Talking about things below two ton here.

Any ideas?
Did you remember to use capslock to turn on fine control? Generally that helps quite a bit.
I didn't even know fine control was a thing. I'll try that out next time. Thanks
It's also worth it to invest in a device with analog controls. Joystick, gamepad, etc.
